Package com.betterfb

Class UserRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.betterfb.UserRepository
  • public class UserRepository
extends Object
    UserRepository is a stateless session bean that provides database operations for the User entity.

        public User findByResetToken​(String token)
        Finds a User entity by its reset token.
        Parameters:
        token - the reset token of the User to be retrieved
        Returns:

      • updateResetToken

        public void updateResetToken​(String token,
                             LocalDateTime expiration,
                             Long userId)
        Updates the reset token for a user.
        Parameters:
        token - the new reset token
        expiration - the date and time when the token will expire
        userId - the user id for which the token should be updated

      • findUsersForFriendSearch

        public List<User> findUsersForFriendSearch​(String searchQuery,
                                           Long loggedInUserId)
        Finds all users which match the given search query in their username, name or surname. The search is case-insensitive and the search query is treated as a substring to be found. The user with the id given as the second parameter is excluded from the search results.
        Parameters:
        searchQuery - the search query to be searched for in the usernames, names and surnames of the users
        loggedInUserId - the id of the user which should be excluded from the search results
        Returns:
        a list of users which match the search query

      • updateUser

        public void updateUser​(User user)
        Updates the given User entity in the database.
        Parameters:
        user - the User entity to be updated

      • findFriendsSent

        public List<User> findFriendsSent​(Long userId)
        Finds all users which have accepted a friend request from the given user.
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user which sent the friend requests
        Returns:
        a list of users which accepted a friend request from the given user

      • findFriendsReceived

        public List<User> findFriendsReceived​(Long userId)
        Finds all users who have sent and whose friend requests have been accepted by the given user.
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user who received the friend requests
        Returns:
        a list of users who sent and whose friend requests were accepted by the given user
